title: SOLD - 1911 T205 Eddie Collins (x2) - both variations
author: h2oya311

posts.post_title: SOLD - 1911 T205 Eddie Collins (x2) - both variations
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are two different T205 Eddie Collins cards, both with absolutely phenomenal color and registration.  The "mouth open" variation has a small amount of paper loss, slight centering issues, and a crease in the lower right corner.  The "mouth closed" variation has surface wrinkles/creasing, but absolutely perfect centering:

Mouth Open - SGC 40 (VG) - $SOLD
Mouth Closed - G to VG - $SOLD

Or take both for only $XXX.

First to PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it!" will be the new owner.
